item.title: Supervised machine learning algorithms
item.description: -Differences and similarities, Where to use what? We know that there are numerous algorithms that can be used for modeling in data science. But with just data given with no specifications, its difficult to understand which one to use where.

item.title: The correlation-Causation fallacy
item.description: If correlation does not imply causation, what does? **How do we apply this to our learning? What do we consider while analyzing data or for machine learning?

item.title: R for dummies
item.description: -How I stated with R New to R? Interested in Data science? This is a short blog on how I started learning R and understanding how to use and utilize it.

item.title: Geospatial anaysis
item.description: This project is being done under softanbees. The project include analysis of sentinel 2 data for understanding vegetation extend for perticular area. The analysis on implementation and conclusion is under progress/

item.title: TIME TABLE AUTOMATION
item.description: In this project done under ECE dept. RVCE, we have tried to make an automatic time table generator that gives the optimal solution to the inputs given.
